actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend further the Peace Corps Act.

summary.text: Amends the Peace Corps Act to authorize the appropriation of sums not in excess of $67,155,000 for fiscal year 1977 and such sums as may be necessary for fiscal year 1978 to carry out the purposes of such Act. Authorizes, under such Act, in addition to amounts authorized for fiscal year 1976, the appropriation of sums not in excess of $1,000,000 for increases in salary, pay, retirement, or other employee benefits for fiscal year 1976. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary for such purposes for fiscal years 1977 and 1978.

titles.title: A bill to amend further the Peace Corps Act.
